TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IApplicationHost

Docs.summary: Retrieves information about the application host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationHost> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.Configuration.IConfigMapPathFactory GetConfigMapPathFactory() cil managed

Docs.summary: Enables creation of an interface in the target application domain.
Docs.returns: An object that is used to map virtual and physical paths of the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationHost.GetConfigMapPathFactory%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance native int GetConfigToken() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the token for the application host configuration (.config) file.
Docs.returns: A Windows handle that contains the Windows security token for the application's root. The token can be used to open and read the application configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationHost.GetConfigToken%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetPhysicalPath() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the application's root physical path.
Docs.returns: The physical path of the application root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationHost.GetPhysicalPath%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
